basic_info.name: Why to Join JNTU College of Engineering, Kakinada, Andhra Pradesh?

Section.name: About JNTUK University College of Engineering, Kakinada
Section.description:
The Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University College of Engineering was started to be a value-driven global-level University and model of excellence leading our peers in technical education. This institute also envisions and endeavors to produce integrity-driven individuals who benefit the society, in the long run. Our perspective is to focus on Education, Research, Recognition, Transformation, and Innovation. We aim to provide global standard education through innovative research and significant discovery. We aim to facilitate the transformation of Andhra Pradesh through increased entrepreneurship and regional wealth development. We wish to create a person who is educated and efficient to lead a successful and contributing life.
Establishment Year
1946 (Formerly The College of Engineering, Vizagpatnam)
Governing Body
Autonomous since 2003
Affiliation
Andhra University
Admission Through
EAMCET (Engineering Agriculture & Medical Common Entrance Test) counseling or enrollment with JNTU Kakinada
Institutional Area
110 Acres
Scholarship
Liaison with banks for arrangement of student loans. Arrangement for fee waivers and work-study opportunities also
Institutes Under JNTU College of Engineering
165 other Engineering Colleges
Total Faculty Members

Library - Total Books, Journals & Periodicals
More than 57,000 volumes of books and 12 contributed journals
Student Clubs
Student chapter of IEEE and CSI. Community Development Program
Hostel – Accommodation Capacity
Nearly 400 boys and 300 girls
How to Reach
3 Kms Distance from Kakinada Railway Station
